product_name: Craft Active Run Fitness Shorts - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Good gear lets you keep your mind on your training. The Craft Active Run fitness shorts offer complete comfort thanks to smooth fabric and a snug fit that provides support for long training sessions. Lightweight, breathable polyester/spandex blend wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly; ergonomic construction allows freedom of movement. Snug fit provides support and eliminates chafing and rubbing. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Zippered back pocket; drawstring-adjustable waistband with mesh interior; reflective details; 4 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Good gear lets you keep your mind on your training. The Craft Active Run fitness shorts offer complete comfort thanks to smooth fabric and a snug fit that provides support for long training sessions.
